column5: ジライア：俺は犬になんかならねぇ
column6: I'm nobody's dog!
column7: NOTE: The first few voice clips here actually come from "deleted scenes" that don't appear anywhere in the main game. They were used in an earlier incarnation of the game, and a few of the scenes from that version were retained for the title demo reel.

column5: ジライア：うわーっ！体がっ・・・動かない！
column6: I...I can't move!

column5: ジライア：ば、ばかヤロー！離せよ！お前、カエルが嫌いなんだろ？
column6: L-Lemme go, you idiot!
I thought you hated toads!

column5: ジライア：じゃあなって…おい、オロチ丸！オロチ丸！！
column6: {Farewell}? Huh--?
Hey, Orochimaru?! OROCHIMARU!

column5: ジライア：幻王丸、生きていたのか！
column6: Genoumaru! You're still alive!

column5: ジライア：俺は誰の命令も受ける気は無いねぇ
column6: I don't take orders from anyone!

column5:
ジライア！！\n
それで　わしは　おまえに　今まで\n
苦しい修行を　あたえてきたのだ！！
column6:
Ziria! It is for this that I have put you\n
through such harsh training up until now!
column7: NOTE: All clips from this point on come from the finished game and correspond to lines in the regular script. This one is map-0x118B-0x373_1

column5: グウグウ　わしゃねむい
column6: So sleepy...

column5: (clanging sounds)

ええい！こしぬけめ！！\n
さっさと　かえれ！
column6:
Tch! Coward!\n
Get out of my sight!

column5:
これで　この国も　あんしんじゃ\n
アッパレ！　アッパレ！！
column6:
My lands are finally safe!\n
Well done, well done!

column5:
３人そろわねば\n
ジパングを　すくえないのに
column6: Alas, Jipang can only be saved if the three heroes join forces...

column5: (sound effect)

みんなで　力を　あわせるのじゃ！\n
行け！　ジライア！！
column6:
You must all fight together!\n
Go forth, young Ziria!

column5:
あなた　勇者！　マサカド　たおす！\n
わたし　ソレ　おてつだいします！\n
また　会いましょう　バーイ！
column6:
You are brave! You defeat Masakado!\n
I help!
See you soon, byeee!

column5:
勇者ジライアよ！！\n
おれの　子どもを　その力で\n
助け出してくれないか
column6:
Brave Ziria!\n
I beg of you to rescue my son!

column5:
オニさんが　ついてきて\n
くれるなら　こころづよいね\n
ジライア！！
column6:
It's so cool that Oni Guy joined us!\n
Right, Ziria?

column5: ポンポコリン！
column6: Ponpokorin!
column7: NOTE: map-0x124F-0x31A_1 (probably, they had plenty of clips of this to choose from)

column5:
わしは　なまぐさ　坊主じゃ\n
大門教が　キライでの　あんたらと\n
いっしょに　戦うことにした
column6: I'm a corrupt priest who hates the Cult of Daimon.
I'm coming with you.

column5:
あなたが　ウワサの勇者ですね！\n
ドーマンは　この奥にいます\n
わたしも　戦いますよ　ジライアさん！
column6:
You must be the famous hero!\n
Douman is hiding inside.
Allow me to assist, Ziria-san!

column5:
あんたが　火の勇者として\n
大門教の　デーモンたちと　戦うなら\n
かならずや　ちからになるぜ！！
column6: If you're going up against the demons of the Cult of Daimon,
I'll be behind you all the way!

column5:
うむ！　伝説は　ほんとう　だった！！\n
やはり　火の勇者だけの　ことはある
column6:
The tales were true:\n
you ARE the Fire Heroes!

column5:
あたしたちには　神さまが\n
ついてるんだ！　ジパングの　人が\n
みんな　オーエンして　くれてるんだ！
column6: We have the Gods on our side! And the people of Jipang are counting on us!

column5:
かならず　ダンジョウを　たおしてね\n
おとうさん　ジライアさん
column6: Father! Ziria-san! I know you can defeat Danjou once and for all!

column5:
あなたは　ジライアさんね\n
ウワサは　きいて　いるわ\n
じつは　サルのボスって　大門教なのよ
column6:
Ziria-san, I presume?\n
I've heard an interesting rumor.
Apparently, the new monkey boss is a Daimonist.

column5:
わるいこと　いいまへんがな\n
ワテも　入会しとる　大門教に\n
はいりなはれ
column6:
Just a li'l word of advice, neighbor:\n
Join the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
やつらを　たおせるのは　ジライアよ！\n
そちたち　火の勇者のみじゃ！
column6: Ziria! Only Fire Heroes such as yourself stand a chance!

column5:
どうだ　ジライアはん！！\n
その　ツナデ　１０００両で\n
売りまへんか？
column6:
How 'bout it, Ziria?\n
What say ya sells her to me for 両1,000?

column5:
大門教が　かなり　ひろまってるヨ！\n
ワタシ　ここでも　大門教　やっつける\n
てつだいネ！　がんばってるんダヨ！
column6:
Cult of Daimon, everywhere!\n
Am here to help beat Cult of Daimon!
Work hard!

column5: (sound effect)
column7: NOTE: sound of sesshouseki falling on checkpoint

column5:
大門教に　つかまっちまった\n
くやしいね　そうだ　ヘヘヘ\n
いいものを　おしえるぜ！
column6: I can't believe I got captured by the Daimonists...

Oh, yeah! Heh heh heh!\n
Lemme teach you something special!

column5:
いま　スゴイこと　考えてます\n
大門教　やっつける\n
カラクリの　兵隊さん　デス！
column6: Come up with great idea!
Mechanic soldier to fight Cult of Daimon!

column5:
それは　こまった！\n
このままでは\n
ジパングが　ほろびてしまう
column6:
Ah, that is a terrible shame...\n
Then Jipang is doomed.

column5:
どうか　江戸城にいる\n
父上と　そして　江戸の町民を\n
救って　ください！
column6:
My father is in Edo Castle.\n
I beg of you...Save him!
Save the people of Edo!

column5:
ついに　ここまで　来たな　ジライア！\n
ここからは　大門教の本拠地だ！
column6:
We're finally here, Ziria.\n
The stronghold of the Cult of Daimon.

column5:
ゴクッ　きんちょー　するなあ！\n
でも　ジライア！　あたしたち三人が\n
いれば　ぜったいに　負けないよね
column6: Whew...Talk about nerve-wracking!

But we got this, Ziria!\n
We just need to stick together!

column5:
この　ジパングは\n
大門教が　すべて　支配するのだ！！
ハハハハ・・・・
column6: Jipang will fall to the Cult of Daimon!

column5: 我はマサカド！
column6: I am Masakado!
column7: NOTE: subtitles for masakado's voice-only line right before he's revived

column5: ジパングの王なり！
column6: True sovereign of Jipang!
